alert.note: Alert for Scott (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 4:12AM CST until February 16 at 5:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following counties, Anderson, Campbell, Claiborne, Scott and Union. * WHEN...Until 830 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 510 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding of small streams and ponding of water in poor drainage areas is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... La Follette, Jacksboro, Caryville, Rocky Top, Norris, Fincastle, Norris Dam State Park, Norris Lake, Big Ridge State Park, Disney, Cove Lake State Park, Sharps Chapel, Rose Hill, Smokey Junction and Norma. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
